TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WrapDirection extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica as instruções permitidas que o conteúdo pode encapsular ao redor do objeto.

span.span: Specifies the allowable directions that content can wrap around an object.

remarks.format: ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o atributo de um elemento.The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FigurePropsXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_figurepropsxaml)] O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o propriedade programaticamente.The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FigureProps](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_figureprops)] [!code-vb[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FigureProps](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_figureprops)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.WrapDirection Both = int32(3)

summary.span: Conteúdo que só flui em torno dos dois lados do objeto.

span.span: Content that flows around both sides of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.WrapDirection Left = int32(1)

summary.span: Conteúdo que só flui em torno do lado esquerdo do objeto.

span.span: Content that only flows around the left side of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.WrapDirection None = int32(0)

summary.span: Conteúdo que não flui ao redor do objeto.

span.span: Content that does not flow around the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.WrapDirection Right = int32(2)

summary.span: Conteúdo que só flui em torno do lado direito do objeto.

span.span: Content that only flows around the right side of the object.
